experiment.name: Transcription profiling by array of Arabidopsis trichome from 5th and 6th rosette leaves of gtl1-1 mutant and wild type controls

description.text: Total RNA from trichomes of fifth and sixth rosette leaves of three-week-old wild-type and gtl1-1 mutants (Figure 3B) were extracted. We found a total number of 1,759 genes, corresponding to 1,694 probes on the ATH1 chip, that show differential expression of at least 1.3-fold. Out of these 1,694 genes, 47.2% are positively regulated and 52.8% are negatively regulated by GTL1. Compared gene expressions in fifth and sixth rosette leaves of three-week-old wild-type and gtl1-1 mutants

bibliography.authors: Breuer C, Morohashi K, Kawamura A, Takahashi N, Ishida T, Umeda M, Grotewold E, Sugimoto K.
bibliography.title: Transcriptional repression of the APC/C activator CCS52A1 promotes active termination of cell growth
